response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value to both of us. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is worth $1,200,000 to you. Considering its high demand and the scarcity of such items in the market, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special introductory price of $1,100,000. This is an excellent opportunity to secure this valuable asset at a discount. Should you choose to accept this offer, I assure you that you will be making a wise investment. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1100000}
